Wisdom: إِنَّ عُمُرَكَ مَهْرُ [سهر] سَعَادَتِكَ إِنْ أَنْفَذْتَهُ فِي طَاعَةِ رَبِّكَ
enWisdom: Verily your lifetime is the dower of your prosperity if you spend it in obedience to your Lord

Wisdom: إِنَّ عُمُرَكَ عَدَدُ أَنْفَاسِكَ وَعَلَيْهَا رَقِيبٌ تُحْصِيهَا
enWisdom: Verily your lifespan is the number of your breaths, and there is a watcher who counts them

Wisdom: فَيَا لَهَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى ذِي غَفْلَةٍ إِنْ يَكُنْ عُمُرُهُ عَلَيْهِ حُجَّةً وَأَنْ تُؤَدِّبَهُ [تُؤَدِّيَهُ‏] أَيَّامُهُ إِلَى شَقْوَةٍ
enWisdom: Pitiable indeed is the negligent person whose entire life will be used as proof against him and whose days will lead him to wretchedness

Wisdom: قَصِّرِ الْأَمَلَ فَإِنَّ الْعُمُرَ قَصِيرٌ وَافْعَلِ الْخَيْرَ فَإِنَّ يَسِيرَهُ كَثِيرٌ
enWisdom: Reduce [your] hopes, for verily life is short; and perform good actions, for verily little of it is plenty

Wisdom: لَيْسَ شَيْ‏ءٌ أَعَزَّ مِنَ الْكِبْرِيتِ الْأَحْمَرِ إِلَّا مَا بَقِيَ مِنْ عُمُرِ الْمُؤْمِنِ
enWisdom: There is nothing more valuable than red sulphur, except that which remains from the lifetime of a believer

Wisdom: هَلْ يَنْتَظِرُ أَهْلُ غَضَاضَةِ الشَّبَابِ إِلَّا حَوَانِيَ‏ [خوافي‏] الْهَرَمِ
enWisdom: Are the people who are enjoying the vitality of good health awaiting anything other than the afflictions of illness?!

Wisdom: لَا يَعْرِفُ قَدْرَ مَا بَقِيَ مِنْ عُمُرِهِ إِلَّا نَبِيٌّ أَوْ صِدِّيقٌ
enWisdom: Nobody knows how much longer he has to live except a Prophet or a man of truth
